thread.title: BRIEF-Eversource Says Northern Pass Seeks To Resume Case Before N.H. Site Evaluation Committee

title: BRIEF-Eversource Says Northern Pass Seeks To Resume Case Before N.H. Site Evaluation Committee

organizations.name: n.h. site evaluation committee reuters staff

text: February 28, 2018 / 7:22 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Eversource Says Northern Pass Seeks To Resume Case Before N.H. Site Evaluation Committee Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Eversource: * EVERSOURCE ENERGY - NORTHERN PASS FILED MOTION REQUESTING N.H. SITE EVALUATION COMMITTEE TO VACATE ITS RECENT DECISION ON PROPOSED NORTHERN PASS PROJECT * EVERSOURCE - NORTHERN PASS SEEKS TO RESUME CASE BEFORE N.H. SITE EVALUATION COMMITTEE, PRESENTS COMPREHENSIVE SOLUTION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
